tool_description: State of the art spam filtering apis with spam score. Despam strives to remain carbon neutral at the same time without compromising with the results of our API.
name: DeSpam Spam Filter
title: DeSpam Spam Filter

api_list.name: Spam Filter
api_list.description: Provide the `input` in json and it will return `spamProabability` in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://despam-spam-filter.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/predict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "despam-spam-filter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://despam-spam-filter.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/predict"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
